summary.p: Received Vadian's letter [No. 894] and promises to return it. Recommends Michael [Adam?]. Has not yet found time to read Bullinger's [“De origine erroris”].

div.p: I received the letter from Vadianus; I will ensure that it is returned to you in good faith and that it reaches certain people not without benefit to the church.
I commend this Michael to you. Farewell in the Lord Christ.
I have not yet read your booklet; the Lord knows that until now there has been no convenient time for that task, as business, although trivial and childish, distracts me.
Again, farewell and love me in the Lord. May the Lord Christ keep us. Amen. Your Grynäus.
